Description: This module can be used to count variants of specific genotypes present in specific samples. This module gives the count for one sample at a time selected by the user. The sample names can be selected from the dynamically populated dropdown list from the IndividualID field defined in the PED file.

Parameters:

Chose Genotype: The user can chose the genotype of the variants: HET (heterozygous), HOM_ALT (homozygous alternate) or HET HOM_ALT (heterozygous and homozygous) from the dropdown list.

Required columns in PED file:

IndividualID is mandatory column in the PED file.
